Company Slogan: ReplyQuickAI Automates Your Calls, Bookings, and Follow-Ups—For Any Business, Automatically.
Company Description: ReplyQuickAI automates your calls, bookings, and follow-ups - so you never miss a lead.   Spend less time chasing, and more time closing.
Job Description: We’re offering a 4-week summer internship (15–20 hours/week, remote) for current college students passionate about UI/UX design and looking to gain hands-on experience with a U.S. startup team. Join ReplyQuick, a fast-growing AI platform helping service businesses respond instantly to calls, texts, and leads. We're currently rebuilding our entire backend — and we need design support to overhaul the interface. Internship Scope Redesign the backend interface in Figma with a focus on simplicity, clarity, and usability Help create cleaner tab layouts, smarter button placement, and improved user flow Collaborate with our dev team (15+ members) as they implement designs Make design tweaks as needed during the build phase What We’re Looking For Currently enrolled in college (any year) Strong interest or background in UI/UX design Experience with Figma required Comfortable working in fast-paced startup teams Clear communication, quick response time, and team spirit What You’ll Gain Real startup experience working on a live redesign project Portfolio-ready design work for a U.S.-based tech product Collaboration with full-stack developers and product leadership A letter of recommendation upon successful completion of the internship
